觡字的基本解释

觡
gé
有蹄兽类的骨质实心的角：“其神状皆兽身人面载觡。”
麋鹿有分叉的角。

觡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gé］
［《廣韻》古伯切，入陌，見。］
骨角。《礼记·乐记》：“角觡生。”《史记·乐书》：“角觡生。”《淮南子·主术训》：“桀之力制觡伸鉤索鐵。”高诱注：“觡，角也。”晋郭璞《江赋》：“或鹿觡象鼻。”宋王安石《进二经札子》：“然方大聖以神道設教，覺悟羣生之時，羽毛皮觡之物，尚能助發實相。”一说，麋角无枝曰角，有枝曰觡。见《玉篇·角部》。

觡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觡； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1141第16
【唐韻】古百切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】各額切，?音格。【說文】骨角之名也。【廣韻】鹿角。【玉篇】麋角有枝曰觡，無枝曰角。【禮·樂記】角觡生。【註】無䚡曰角。【前漢·司馬相如傳】犧雙觡共抵之獸。　又【淮南子·主術訓】制觡伸鉤，索鐵歙金。高註觡，角也。　又木名。【爾雅·釋木註】橿木，江東呼木觡。　又鉤名。【揚子·方言】宋楚?魏之閒，謂鉤爲鹿觡。【註】鉤，懸物者。或呼鹿角。　又叶剛鶴切，音各。【郭璞·玃如獸贊】玃如之獸，鹿狀四觡。貌兼三形，攀木緣石。石音芍。

考證：〔【禮·樂記】角觡生。【註】無腮曰角。〕　謹照原文腮改䚡。〔又角索絞也。【淮南子·主術訓】桀之力制觡伸鉤。〕　謹按淮南註觡角索絞也。乃訓觡爲角，訓索爲絞，非訓觡爲角索絞也。謹照原文改爲淮南子主術訓制觡伸鉤索鐵歙金。高註觡角也。
觡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觡字的起名意思

暂无。

horns
Basic explanation of words
horns
gé
The bony solid horns of hoofed beasts: "Its gods are all beasts with human faces."
Elk has forked horns.
horns
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gé］
["Guangyun" Gu Boqie, enter the Mo, see. ]
Bone horns. "Book of Rites·Le Records": "Horse of the horns." "Historical Records: Music of the horns." "Huainanzi · Master Skill Training": "The power of Jie makes the horns stretch out the hook and rope." Gao You Note: "God, horns." Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "Or Deer's Elephant Trunk." Song Wang Anshi's "Jin Erjing Zhazi": "However, when the great sage of Fang set up his teachings based on the divine Tao, he realized that when the group was born, Things that are feathered and skinned can still help the truth." In one word, moose horns without branches are called horns, but branches are called horns. See "Jade Chapter · Corner".
horns

[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觡; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1141 to 16
[Tang Yun] Ancient Baiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Each frontal cut,? Phonetic pattern. [Said the text] The name of the bone horn is also. [Guang Yun] Antlers. [Jade articles] Moose horns with branches are called horns, but without branches, they are called horns. [Li·Le Ji] The horned students. [Note] There is no such thing as a corner. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Sacrifice the beast of the two gorges.　[Huainanzi·Master Skill Training] Make hooks and stretch hooks, so Tieshejin. High note, angle also.　Also wooden name. 【Erya·Shimu Note】Kashimu, Jiangdong Humuzu.　 Also hook name. 【Yangtze Dialect】Soong Chu? Wei Zhixian called the hook deer. [Note] Hook, hanging objects. Or call deer antlers.　Ye Ganghe cut again, each sound. 【Guo Pu·Xuan Ru Beast Praise】Yuan Ru beast, deer-like four gorges. Both appearance and three shapes, climbing wood curbs. Shi Yin Shao. Textual research: [[Ritual·Le Ji] Horned Goblet Student. [Note] No cheeks say horns. 〕　I would like to change the cheek according to the original text. [The horns are twisted again. 【Huainanzi·Master Skill Training】The force of Jie controls the hook extension. 〕 　 I would like to twist the horns according to the Huainan Note. It is a horn for training, a twist for training, and a twist for non-training. According to the original text, I would like to change the Huainan sub-master's skill training system to stretch the hook and the tie shejin. High injection angle is also.
